summary: Reality Spells a spell mod. This  mod adds new spells to your game. Mod testing phase. 3 spells in this version.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000]Mod was frozen for a long time.[/color][/center]

[center][color=#eecfa1][b]Mod Updated to 1.1 Now download from \"Updates\". Enjoy and don\'t forget to read \"Read Me\"[/b][/color][/center]

[color=#ff0000]What is this mod?[/color]
[color=#cdc673]This mod makes spells reality. ?f you want detail. Download it :)[/color]

[color=#ff0000]Where can i find main file\'s spell?[/color]
[color=#cdc673]You should write to console \" Real \" Use page up and find its code.[/color]

[color=#ff0000]Where can I find 1.2 Update\'s spells?[/color]
[color=#cdc673]You can find 1.2 Update\'s books in Arch-Mage Quarters near the enchant table. Look to ground.[/color]

[color=#ff0000]Should I delete RealStorm.esp?[/color]
[color=#cdc673]No, of course. But if you don\'t like Real Storm Spell, delete it.[/color]



 

[center][size=18pt][color=#1d78f0]REALITY SPELLS MOD[/color][/size][/center]



[color=#ff0000]READ! - If this mod doesn\'t work tell me. I try update.[/color]

[color=#e6f8e0]This is a spell mod. Adds a strong spell to your game. Read Me in the archive. Have Fun! I hope you like it. 

This spell really give high damage your enemies. But don\'t forget this; if your follower or a citizien in this group they takes damage too. So be careful.[/color]

[color=#f6cece]?f you like this mod please endorse me. And if you want other spell leave me a message. I try for you. :)[/color]

[center][b][color=#eecfa1]What\'s coming with new update[/color][/b][/center]

[color=#eecfa1][b]New spells coming with update. For example from new spells;

Mod was updated to 1.1. Wait for 1.2[/b][/color]
author: Savalera

files.name: Real Storm - Spell Mod - by savalera
